I

intArrayToHexString(int[]) - Static method in class miniaesdemo.Utilities
This method converts a Integer Array to a Hexadecimal String.
intArrayToString(int[]) - Static method in class miniaesdemo.Utilities
This method converts an Integer Array to a 16-bit binary String.
intArrayToStringArray(int[]) - Static method in class miniaesdemo.Utilities
This method converts a Integer Array to String Array.
inverseMixColumnsAES(int[]) - Static method in class miniaesdemo.MiniAES
This method multiplies each element of the plaintext by a Rijndael inverse constant matrix.
inverseNibbleSub(int[]) - Static method in class miniaesdemo.MiniAES
This method substitutes the contents of the plainText array with values from the Tables.NIBBLE_SUB_TABLE table using the Tables.getInverseNibbleSubValue(int) method.
inverseSubBytes(int[]) - Static method in class miniaesdemo.MiniAES
This method substitutes the contents of the plainText array with values from the inverse S-BOX table.
INVERTED_S_BOX_TABLE - Static variable in class miniaesdemo.Tables
This variable is a n integer array of elements that store the AES inverse S-BOX substitution table.
